string-array.name: note_contents
string-array.item:
Chicken ~1kg 
Frozen veggies x3 
Something for the tea. Prunes? 
Fresh veggies for a salad 
Ramsons? 
Milk 
Oatmeal 
Bananas
Need new routines. Maybe check out leap fitness apps?

Chicken 1kg: 
- sunflower oil 2tbsp 
- onions 350-400g 
- soy sauce 2-3tbsp 
- garlic clove x3-4 
- black pepper 
- sage 
- rosemary 
- lemon juice 2tbsp 
 
Pork 1kg: 
- kefir. enough to drown the meat + 2 fingers high 
- onions 600g 
- soy sauce 2-3tbsp 
- garlic clove x5 
- black pepper 
- sage 
- rosemary 
 
leave refrigerated overnight
